long_description: Just a light misting of this performance sunscreen provides broad spectrum protection from the sun's burning rays. Non-aerosol pump, Microspray(TM) application is perfect for sports, as it sprays on wet and dries quickly leaving no residue to affect grip. Hypoallergenic, oil-, alcohol- and PABA-free formula provides broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection with Parsol(R) 1789. Water- and sweat-resistant formula doesn't use any fragrances or preservatives. KINeSYS is a carbon neutral manufacturer and uses recyclable packaging with their products.
short_description: Just a light misting of this performance sunscreen provides broad spectrum protection from the sun's burning rays.
